message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both lose value in later rounds, and you lose less than I do per round.

Alice, since you lose 20% per round compared to my 10%, waiting longer hurts you more than me. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor, which is actually better for you than waiting another round where your money would be worth even less.
